Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Fulton/Ashland
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll, and Ashland due to, street blockage near Fulton/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll, and Ashland due to, street blockage near Fulton/Ashland.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Fullerton
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Fullerton due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
